title: Murder Bridge Hill
text: Murder Bridge Hill is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> in <a href="Greene%20County%2C%20New%20York">Greene County, New York</a>. It is located in the <a href="Catskill%20Mountains">Catskill Mountains</a> northeast of <a href="Greenville%20Center%2C%20New%20York">Greenville Center</a>. <a href="King%20Hill%20%28Greene%20County%2C%20New%20York%29">King Hill</a> is located south-southeast of Murder Bridge Hill.
